mapper.select: SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick, find_num, find_reward, find_pet, find_lost_loc, find_lost_date FROM (select rownum n, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick, find_num, find_reward, find_pet, find_lost_loc, find_lost_date from (SELECT b.board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, m.member_num, member_nick, find_num, find_reward, find_pet, find_lost_loc, find_lost_date FROM board b, member m, find f where board_type_num = 11 and b.member_num = m.member_num and b.board_num = f.board_num order by board_num desc)) where n BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT picture_fname, board_num FROM (select rownum n, picture_fname, board_num from (SELECT p.picture_fname, b.board_num FROM picture p, board b where board_type_num = 11 and b.board_num = p.board_num ORDER BY b.board_num desc, picture_file_num )) where n BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
